DOC.brief_title: Treatment Early Onset Schizophrenia Spectrum Disorders ( TEOSS )
DOC.detailed_description: Little research conduct use psychotropic agent child adolescent early onset schizophrenia spectrum disorder . This study compare antipsychotic agent different mechanism action child adolescent schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder active psychotic symptom . Participants randomly assign receive risperidone ( Risperdal ) , olanzapine ( Zyprexa ) , molindone ( Moban ) 8 week . After 11/2005 , additional patient assigned olanzapine treatment . Patients significant improvement without side effect continue maintenance therapy another 44 week . Participants show significant negative symptom 8 week may start mood stabilizer antidepressant . Weight gain , metabolic change , neurocognition , functional outcome , psychotic symptom , extrapyramidal side effect , ability sustain effective therapy time assess .
